name: Crossy Words (Crossword+Fill-Ins+Chainword)
description:
Unique Crosswords and Puzzles mix. New gameplay, new challenge.
Thousands of crosswords, fill-ins and chainwords puzzles!

GAME RULES
• Drag the puzzle blocks to move them.
• Aim to fit them all into the crossword frame.
• Touch puzzle blocks to remove them from the field.

GAME FEATURES
• Solve thousands of crossword puzzles!
• Fill-Ins and Chainwords modes!
• Use hints to get help!
• No time pressure.
• This crossword puzzle is easy in the beginning, but becomes challenging!
Crosswords Builder perfectly fits for fans of crossword, fill-ins, chainwords or word games, combining best of crosswords and block puzzles.
